allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json data = json.load\(sys.stdin\) groups = data.get\(''data'', {}\).get\(''groups'', []\) for g in groups: if g.get\(''name''\) == ''matching-engine-experiment'': rules = g.get\(''rules'', []\) print\(f''Group: {g[""name""]} \({len\(rules\)} rules, interval: {g.get\(""interval"",""?""\)}s\)''\) for r in rules: print\(f'' - {r[""name""]}''\) break else: print\(''Recording rules group NOT FOUND''\) ")

Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json data = json.load\(sys.stdin\) if ''dashboard'' in data: d = data[''dashboard''] print\(f''Dashboard found!''\) print\(f'' Title: {d.get\(""title"", ""?""\)}''\) print\(f'' UID: {d.get\(""uid"", ""?""\)}''\) print\(f'' Panels: {len\(d.get\(""panels"", []\)\)}''\) for p in d.get\(''panels'', []\): print\(f'' - Panel {p[""id""]}: {p[""title""]}''\) print\(f'' Refresh: {d.get\(""refresh"", ""?""\)}''\) print\(f'' Tags: {d.get\(""tags"", []\)}''\) else: print\(f''Dashboard NOT found: {data.get\(""message"", ""unknown error""\)}''\) ")
